input.sentences: [female] was excited to go to location .
she loved how the buildings looked
and how they felt as though they had so much history to them .
she also loved the how there were beautiful churches everywhere .
yes | location was her favorite place in the whole world .
output.sentences: Arriving to her desired location, the female tourist was overtly excited!
She loved traveling and was amazed as she looked at the vintage buildings.
She appreciated the rich history of the city.
She especially loved the historic churches and felt the craftsmanship was astoundingly beautiful.
She believed everyone in the world should visit this location and the white building with the tall tower was her favorite.
